title: Can we trust Manthan Solutions, an online data entry website? - Quora

response.answer_text: I have been doing their so called ‘Data entry’ shit for about 3–4 months and hence I think I consider myself eligible enough to answer this question. So it all begun with an executive calling me and asking me to join their work from home thing where they I am supposed to pay 4500/- for a single project and if they approve that particular project, then they would give a certain amount of salary, beginning with 4000/- to 40000/- (max). I thought I could have done the hard work (specifically looking at the amount (^.^)). I called the executive back and asked her to give me a project of Data typing. The company then mailed me ( the point to be noted here is that the company replied and not any individual, which is absurd enough). They issued me an authentication for that specific software after a hell lot of formalities. Then I started working for the given work. Here comes the real story. You are suppose to take daily backup of your work till the last date of submission (10 days) . Unfortunately, the software keeps on crashing every single time when you are working with windows 8 or windows 10. When I mentioned about this problem to the sales executive she asked me to change my system to windows 7 and a system containing Office 7. Well I dont understand the internal working of the softwares and all of that, but who the dumb son of a cat uses windows 7 and office 7 nowadays man. Anyways, somehow I arranged a laptop with those old school specifications and then started to working with the project again. So this time I had to make them believe that I have a ‘Genuine’ problem and hence requested them to issue another authentication key for the software as I was installing it in another system. The mail appeared to be as this - “Last and final Auth key - ##########”. Its like working for someone who pronounces “SEQUEL” (SQL) as “ESQEL”. Dumb right? Anyways I started working for the project. The thing is that they give a target of completing 200 pages in 10 days. So that's 20 pages a day if you need the maximum amount from them. I have a pretty good speed of typing and yet I needed almost 1 hour to complete a single page of the given project. So for optimum production i needed to dedicate about 20 hours a day for the maximum amount. But its not about the time, its about the content that you are about to write. The content is like the Bibliography of a medical journal. They aren't someone who wants you complete the project. Their strategy is just like every other business plans - “ Try to get the profit by collecting the funds from people, when you arent making profits of your own “. It was a total disappointment and a complete waste of time and money. I would never suggest to work for someone like that. Briefly its better to search for some other options. Dont go for MANTHAN SOLUTIONS EVER.

Manthan solution are complete cheats. The projects given are high level difficulty medical content which are no where near to the content sample difficulty level given while they ask you to pay a deposit amount. A person called "Jai" is a very mean person and misguided me to the T. I have lost Rs2,950 however want to warn people so that they don't lose their hard earned money. STAY AWAY FROM MANTHAN SOLUTION!
